title: Research Assistant
location: Plot 16, Aftabuddin Ahmed Road, Block B, Bashnudhara RA, Dhaka 1229, Bangladesh.
description: I am currently employed as a Research Assistant at IUB's Center for Computational and Data Sciences (CCDS). My main role is to conduct research on computer vision, group theory, manifold learning, and geometric machine learning.
